attributes.action: Liken the cost of living to the average salary in the UK, investigate interest rates, and bring the cost of property to an affordable rate for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK average salaries should allow each person and family to live comfortably within their means.  Every employed person should be able to access the property market and afford a mortgage without the threat of repossession when interest rates rise.  The Bank of England Base Rate should be capped in order that it CANNOT rise above 5%.  Every individual should be able to earn enough to feed and clothe themselves and their family. (Bread is now £1.00 per loaf!!!)
